name: Arm Knight
description:
INTRO

Just a small project to get me back into game dev. Everything is made by me. The color palette is Chasm by disphoriaa. 

INSTRUCTIONS

A and D to move left and right

Spacebar to jump

OTHER

An easy platformer.

I made this in 19 hours over several days. It is not meant to be a well-finished game, just enough to pass as a game. I am trying to get myself more fluent with GameMaker Studio 2 GML so this was just an exercise for me to see how quickly I could create something basic with my knowledge.
